Title of notification for an upcoming trip

trans-unit.id: Get updated ETAs while you're on a trip by reporting you current location back to our servers. This also helps improve our travel time prediction. We may share this data with our partners who help us make those predictions.
trans-unit.source: Get updated ETAs while you're on a trip by reporting you current location back to our servers. This also helps improve our travel time prediction. We may share this data with our partners who help us make those predictions.
trans-unit.target: 通过向服务器报告您的当前位置, 可以帮助您在旅途中获得更新的预计到达时间。这也有助于改善我们的旅行时间预测. 我们可能会与我们的合作伙伴共享这些数据, 来帮助我们做出这些预测。
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
Indicating localisation is in progress
Type for events that are regular visit's to one of the user's favorites

trans-unit.id: Help improve transport services in your area by allowing us to collect information about which trips you select in the app. We aggregate the anomymised data and provide it to researchers, regulators, and transport providers.
trans-unit.source: Help improve transport services in your area by allowing us to collect information about which trips you select in the app. We aggregate the anomymised data and provide it to researchers, regulators, and transport providers.
trans-unit.target: 通过允许我们收集您在应用中选择的旅行信息，帮助改善您所在地区的交通服务。我们对匿名数据进行汇总并提供给研究人员，监管机构和运输提供商。
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.id: Help us improve TripGo by allowing us to collect data about which features you use in the app, and how often.
trans-unit.source: Help us improve TripGo by allowing us to collect data about which features you use in the app, and how often.
trans-unit.target: 通过允许我们收集有关您在应用中使用哪些功能以及使用频率的信息，帮助我们改进TripGo。
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
(No Comment)
Refer to users not care about a particular aspect of their travel, e.g., cost, time, convenience

trans-unit.id: If you have granted TripGo access to your current location, contacts, calendar, and more, you can withdraw access to that data by going to the Settings app.
trans-unit.source: If you have granted TripGo access to your current location, contacts, calendar, and more, you can withdraw access to that data by going to the Settings app.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已授予TripGo对您当前位置，联系人，日历等的访问权限，则可以转到“设置”应用来撤消对该数据的访问权限。
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
This is to indicate a mobility plan is inactive and unavailable for users to subscribe to

Title for an error alert. This error is typicall the result of a user performed something that is not expected. For instance, when the user tries to subscribe to a plan that he/she is already subscribed to.
This indicate when a user joins a mobility plan. Example: Joined on 1st of Sept. 2019.
Title
Button to show a map or to modify the map's settings
Indicator that a transport mode will appear minimised on the routes screen.

This is a type of mobility bundle. It usually means users have to pay the amount specified to access the benefits included in the bundle. The difference between this and the Subscription type is the fees paid can be used on travel.
Title for screen that shows a list of mobility plans currently offered.

This is a type of mobility bundle. It usually means users have to pay some fees per month to access the benefits included in the bundle. The difference between this and the minimum purchase type is the fees paid cannot be used on any travel.

Format string for displaying the discount user received for a trip. The discount is specified as a percentage. An example: Take 5% off every trip Format string for displaying the discount user received for a trip. The discount is specified in the dollar term (as opposed to a percentage). An example: Take $5 off every trip
Button to take a photo
Indicating an action that leads users to pick their home locations. If translation would be too too long, then 'home' can be omitted as it can be inferred from context.
Indicating an action that leads users to pick their work locations. If translation would be too too long, then 'home' can be omitted as it can be inferred from context.

This will delete your account from TripGo's servers. Continued use of TripGo will create a new empty account.

trans-unit.source:
This will delete your account from TripGo's servers. Continued use of TripGo will create a new empty account.
Note, your iCloud data will not be deleted by this, but you can delete this in the Settings app.

这将从TripGo的服务器中删除您的帐户。继续使用TripGo将创建一个新的空帐户。

trans-unit.id: To calculate trips between calendar events, TripGo will send your calendar information to our server and use that data to do the planning for you. You can disable each calendar individually, where you don't want to share this data.
trans-unit.source: To calculate trips between calendar events, TripGo will send your calendar information to our server and use that data to do the planning for you. You can disable each calendar individually, where you don't want to share this data.
trans-unit.target: 要计算日历事件之​​间的旅程，TripGo会将您的日历信息发送到我们的服务器，并使用该数据为您做计划。您可以单独禁用任何一个日历，如果您不希望共享此数据。
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

alt-trans.target: 要计算日历事件之​​间的旅程，TripGo会将您的日历信息发送到我们的服务器，并使用该数据为您做计划。您可以单独禁用每个日历，如果您不希望共享此数据。

trans-unit.id: To show transport options, we may share per-query information of start location, end location, and query time with transport providers. You can disable each mode individually, where you don't want to share this data.

trans-unit.target: 为了显示可用的交通工具，我们可能会与交通工具提供者共享您查询时的开始位置，结束位置和查询时间。您可以单独禁用任何一个交通工具模式，如果您不希望共享这些数据。

trans-unit.target: 本功能需要使用定位服务. 请到设定 > 隐私 > 定位服务确认服务是开启的，同时也请确认您已授权本App使用定位服务.
trans-unit.note: Location iOS authorisation needed text
Reminder to leave preference

trans-unit.id: Please enter your registered email address. We will then send you instructions on how to reset password
trans-unit.source: Please enter your registered email address. We will then send you instructions on how to reset password
trans-unit.target: 请输入您的注册电子邮件地址。然后，我们将向您发送有关如何重置密码的说明
trans-unit.note: A footnote that asks users for their email addresses in order to reset password
Please select a location prompt

trans-unit.id: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.source: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.target: 请再试一遍或者手动设置您的位置。
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion when GPS fails.
Please verify the location prompt

trans-unit.target: 点击'搜寻'来取得更多结果…

trans-unit.id: Primary email is not set on your account. Please contact us for support

trans-unit.target: 您的帐户未设置主电子邮件。请联系我们获取支持
trans-unit.note: Message to user if no primary email is set on his/her account

trans-unit.id: Secure passwords are at least five characters long and include numbers and symbols

trans-unit.target: Secure passwords are at least five characters long and include numbers and symbols
trans-unit.note: A footnote that tells recommends the format of a secure password.
Text often displayed in a HUD, informing users some request has successfully been sent, e.g., a request to resend a verification email
Class of errors generated by our servers
Error message when our server returns empty data in response to a network request

Indicator for how many transport modes are being displayed out of the total available ones for the region of the trip. First placeholder will be replaced with selected number, second with total number.

Instruction for signing out user account
Title of page or button to sign up

trans-unit.id: The password field cannot be empty.
trans-unit.source: The password field cannot be empty.

trans-unit.source: The username or password you've entered is incorrect.

Message that informs users that some values are missing from the required fields in a booking form.
Title for a button which, when tapped, proceeds to verifying password
Prompt for users to enter their passwords for verification purpose.
Every weekday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Every weekend day in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: Would you like to report a problem?
trans-unit.source: Would you like to report a problem?

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: 您需要同意订阅条款和规定。
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: 您需要同意保险条款和规定。
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C for insurance must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: 您之前拒绝了App使用您的日历．如想要使用本功能，请到设定 > 隐私 > 日历中更新您的授权.
trans-unit.note: Calendar authorisation needed text

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: 您之前拒绝了App使用您的通讯录．如想要使用本功能，请到设定 > 隐私 > 通讯录中更新您的授权.
trans-unit.note: Contacts authorisation needed text
Indicator that an event is all-day, or that something is open all-day
Estimated time of arrival; parameter is time, e.g., 'arrives 15:30'
Estimated time of departure; parameter is time, e.g., 'departs 15:30'
Short indicator of end-time
Email placeholder text
Short indicator of start-time
to %date. (old key: DateToFormat)

trans-unit.id: userToken is missing in the server response
trans-unit.source: userToken is missing in the server response
trans-unit.target: 服务器响应中缺少用户令牌
trans-unit.note: Error message when our server fails to return userToken in response to a sign in or sign up request
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Title for something that happened a certain timeframe ago, e.g., '5 mins ago'
Number of alerts, in this case, there are multiple (plural)
Filler for a specific service running at a time, e.g., '396 at 11:56am'
Indicator for how cycle-friendly a cycling route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Filler for a specific frequency-based service indicating its frequency, e.g., 'M10 every 10 minutes'
Text for an 'x more' indication if there's more content. '%@' will be replaced with a number
Number of stops before you get off a vehicle, if there are 2 stops or more, e.g., '10 stops'. (old key: Stops)
Duration without traffic
Indicator for how wheelchair-friendly a wheeelchair route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of alerts, in this case, there is just one
Number of stops before you get off a stop, if there's just 1 stop.
No comment provided by engineer.

Instruction to follow unnamed street

apple maps directions action

The first '%@' will be replaced with the place of arrival, the second with the time. (old key: ArrivalLocationTime)
Arrive before button
Title for when you'll arrive when on a trip. Countdown to arrival will be displayed below.
Used when the trip does not end at the requested location, but nearby. The '%@' will be replaced with requested destination location.

'At %location' indicator for parts of a trip that happen at a single location, e.g., waiting at a platform, parking at a car park. (old key: PrimaryLocationStationary) Filler for a service running at time, e.g., 'At 11:56am'
Text for vehicle of type: Bicycle

Used when the trip does not start at the requested location, but nearby. The '%@' will be replaced with requested departure location.

Destination of the bus
To disconnect/unlink from a service provider, e.g., Uber

As in 'this bus/train is empty'

Title for button to get/download an external app.

Instruction to get a service towards provided destination
Title of button to start a trip
google maps directions action
Trip badge: Greenest
Trip badge: Healthiest

trans-unit.id: Routing from %@ to %@ is not yet supported
trans-unit.source: Routing from %1$@ to %2$@ is not yet supported

trans-unit.note: Error message if interregional routing isn't yet supported

Send SMS action button
Title for displaying the details of a public transport service (i.e., a specific departure of a specific route)
Alert if service has been cancelled, meaning that the user can't take it and find an alternative
Set up to connect/link to a service provider, e.g., Uber
Title for button that, when tapped, shows something, e.g., a list of alert
Show website action button
As in 'this bus/train is fairly full and has standing room only'
